brief_summary.textblock:
This study is a multicenter, randomized study in subjects with high cholesterol receiving
      highly effective statins to assess the efficacy, safety and tolerability of RN316
      (PF-04950615) to lower LDL-C.

clinical_study.brief_title: Randomized Clinical Trial of RN316 (PF-04950615) in Subjects With Hyperlipidemia or Mixed Dyslipidemia at Risk of Cardiovascular Events

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Treated with a statin.

          -  Fasting LDL-C > 70 mg/dL and triglyceride <=400 mg/dL.

          -  High or very high risk of incurring a cardiovascular event.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Pregnant or breastfeeding females.

          -  Cardiovascular or cerebrovascular event of procedures during the past 30 days.

          -  Congestive heart failure NYHA class IV.

          -  Poorly controlled hypertension.

intervention.description: 150 mg every 2 weeks, subcutaneous injection, 18 months
subcutaneous injection every 2 weeks for 18 months

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 3 Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Parallel-Group Study To Assess The Efficacy, Long-Term Safety And Tolerability Of Pf-04950615 In Subjects With Primary Hyperlipidemia Or Mixed Dyslipidemia At Risk Of Cardiovascular Events

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: Percent Change from Baseline in LDL-C at Week 12

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Percent change in Total Cholesterol (TC), Apolipoprotein B (Apo B), non-HDL-C, LDL-C by TG level (< or >+ 200 mg/dL),  Lipoprotein (a) (Lp(a), High Density Lipoprotein (HDL), Triglyceride,  ApoA-I, and ApoA-II blood concentrations.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Lipid Parameters at Week 12

secondary_outcome.description: Low Density Lipoprotein (LDL), Mean Total Cholesterol (TC), High Density Lipoprotein (HDL), Triglyceride, ApoA-I, and ApoA-II blood concentrations.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Lipid Parameters at Week 24

secondary_outcome.description: Low Density Lipoprotein (LDL), Mean Total Cholesterol (TC), High Density Lipoprotein (HDL), Triglyceride, ApoA-I, and ApoA-II blood concentrations.
secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Lipid Parameters at Week 52

secondary_outcome.description: Proportion of Subjects Achieving Fasting LDL-C <= 100 mg/dL and <=70 mg/dL
